titleStmt.title: The treaty of Pyrennes:, or, Articles of peace, between the crowns of France and Spain; concluded and signed the seventh of November, 1659. With reference to the peace in hand.
Treaties, etc. Spain, 1659 November 7
titleStmt.author: France.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W. Drury, near the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
